message:
yes can you give me how I could view the the phone app on my phone using termias and a web browser or is this not possible I really don't want to view native HTML pages but I want to view the entire app if possible in a browser if not we'll have to just go and create the APK version I'm just looking for a quick and easy solution that I can test the application and make sure that everything is working because we've got a bit of backend work to do
